errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

order.pleaseSelect: Please select if you have any of the following condition ?
order.scheduleReqSuccessSubtext: Booking confirmed and the slot has been scheduled on requested time.
order.scheduleReqFaiureSubtext: Booking has not been confirmed on requested time. Please try scheduling on some other time
order.agentToScanTheBelowQRToCheckin: Agent to scan the below QR to checkin
order.showTheQRCodeForEasyCheckin: Show the QR Code for easy check in

TMS.quanta TMS Subtext: The ‘’Quanta Ticket Management’’ App is a valuable tool that simplifies the process of raising and resolving issues for customers.
TMS.footerContent: Enhance support experience with Quanta TMS.

secondScreen.subText: Quanta Ticket Management ensures that issues are resolved quickly and effectively. The app assigns the issue to the most suitable department and provides an efficient workflow for tracking the progress of the ticket. This allows users to keep track of their tickets and ensure that any issues are resolved in a timely manner.

thirdScreen.Tag a personSubtext: Tagging a person allows for more effective management of tickets, by ensuring that the correctperson or team is responsible for resolving theissues and that tickets are assigned and prioritizedbased on their urgency and type of issue.
thirdScreen.Video CallSubtext: Our video call feature in a ticket managementsystem can be a powerful tool for improvingcustomer support and customer satisfaction,by allowing for more effective communicationand collaboration between customers andsupport agents.
thirdScreen.Reference TicketSubtext: A reference ticket can be used to provideadditional information about a specific issue,such as previous solutions that wereattempted or any relevant documentation.

fifthScreen.User-Friendly InterfaceSubtext: Simplify ticket management with Quanta Ticket Management App. User-friendly interface for quick and easy ticket raising and management. Streamlined design for effortless navigation and information access. Try Quanta Ticket Management App today!

sixthScreen.contentSubtext: Streamline event management with Quanta Tickets App! Organize events, gather feedback, and save time and costs with our comprehensive platform. Try it now!
sixthScreen.entrySubtext: Enter vehicles details and press enter
sixthScreen.processingSubtext: A QR Code copy generated containing informations of Vehicle data,time,place, Agent details etc..
sixthScreen.exitSubtext: Scan QR code using app a perfect Bill amount generated by automatic calculation.

seventhScreen.Heading: Real-Time Updates
seventhScreen.subText: Quanta Ticket Management provides real-time updates on all tickets raised. This allows users to keep track of their tickets and ensure that any issues are being addressed in a timely manner. The app also provides detailed reports on all tickets raised, providing a comprehensive overview of the issue and its resolution

eighthScreen.subText: Amet minim mollit non dese runt
eighthScreen.cardText1: The Quanta Ticket ManagementApp is perfect for manufacturing  companies, it allows us to inform the association of any problem we are facing in the production process and quickly receive a proper solution.
eighthScreen.cardText2: The Quanta Ticket ManagementApp is a lifesaver for our customer support team, it's easy to use and has all the features we need to manage and resolve customer issues quickly and efficiently.
eighthScreen.cardText3: The app's reporting and analytics features are a huge plus, it helpe dus identify patterns and trends in customer support issues and take proactive measures to address them.
eighthScreen.cardText4: The Quanta Ticket Management App is incredibly user-friendly and easy to navigate. It made it simple for me to submit and track my support requests. The direct visit,video call, instant call features are very useful, it allows for more flexibility and faster resolution of issues.
eighthScreen.cardText5: The app's communication and collaboration feature is very helpful, it allowed me to communicate and collaborate with support agents, and the option to schedule direct visits, video calls, and instant calls for faster resolution of issues.
eighthScreen.cardText6: I found the Quanta Ticket Management App to be incredibly user-friendly and easy to navigate.The interface is clean and intuitive, making it simple to submit and track my support requests.

ninethScreen.delightfullySimpleAndPowerfulPosApplicat: Delightfully simple and powerful POS application
ninethScreen.subText: Join thousand users and teams in the community
